name: Amazon Essentials Men's Digital Chronograph Black Resin Strap Watch
description:
• Metalized Black resin case

  • Lcd display with time, seconds and day of the week

  • Functions include: chronograph, alarm and backlight

  • Black textured resin strap with buckle closure
